zh.title: 雪崩币/美元技术分析：[短期下行趋势]
zh.content:
当前雪崩币（AVAX）价格为13.0909美元，过去24小时内下跌2.11%。从价格走势来看，AVAX在13.4266美元的高点处遇到阻力，并有明显的回调迹象，显示出短期内可能存在下行趋势。若价格持续突破当前低点，可能会进一步探测支撑位。

在技术指标方面，MACD为负值（-0.22199529），表明卖压较大，短期内可能缺乏买盘支撑。虽然RSI指标缺失，但结合价格走势和MACD情况，市场情绪偏向于看跌。投资者需关注后续的技术信号，以判断市场反转的可能性。

支撑位方面，关注13.00美元的心理关口，若价格跌破，可能会加速下行。另一方面，若价格反弹至13.75美元（20日简单移动平均线），则可视为短期阻力位。交易者应密切关注这些关键价格水平，以制定合适的交易策略。

建议方面，短期内可考虑在支撑位附近进行低吸，但应保持警惕，设置合理止损。同时，建议等待更多确认信号，避免在市场不确定性较大的情况下贸然入场。积极跟踪市场动态，以便及时调整投资策略。

en.title: Avalanche vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
Avalanche (AVAX) is currently trading at 13.0909, reflecting a 2.11% decline in the past 24 hours. The price is situated near the lower end of the recent trading range, with a high of 13.4266 and the current price potentially indicating bearish sentiment. The trend appears to be downward, as the price has failed to sustain higher levels. A close observation of price action in the coming days will be crucial to ascertain whether a reversal or further decline is imminent.

In the absence of the Relative Strength Index (RSI) data, we can focus on the Moving Average Convergence Divergence (MACD), which currently shows a negative value of -0.22199529. This suggests that the short-term momentum is lagging behind the longer-term trend, reinforcing the bearish outlook. The Simple Moving Average (SMA) of 20 periods at 13.74980 serves as a potential resistance level. If the price can reclaim this area, it may signal a shift in momentum, but until then, the bearish trend remains intact.

Support levels are essential to watch, with immediate support found around 13.00. A breach below this level could lead to further selling pressure, possibly targeting the next support zone near 12.75. Conversely, if the price holds above this support, it could present a buying opportunity for traders looking to capitalize on a potential bounce back. However, caution is advised as market sentiment remains fragile.

For traders considering their positions, a wait-and-see approach may be prudent. Entering long positions could be viable if AVAX breaks above the SMA and maintains upward momentum. On the other hand, short positions may be advantageous if the price breaks below the support level of 13.00, signaling a continuation of the downtrend. Keeping an eye on volume and overall market sentiment will be essential for making informed trading decisions.
